channel.title: Returns To Scope
channel.itunes:author: Thomas Durfee
channel.itunes:subtitle: A discussion of social science goings on
channel.itunes:summary:
Returns to Scope is an educational project. Our goal is to create tools that help teach economics and policy analysis by making practical, clear, and informative content.

The name Returns to Scope is the economic theory that you can accomplish more if you dabble a little in many fields, or if you cover a wide array of topics. The goal of this project is to give simple guides to economics and policy in hopes of making teaching tools that spur learning, discussion, and growth.



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

item.title: RTS - The April 2023 JOLTS Report
item.itunes:title: RTS - The April 2023 JOLTS Report
item.itunes:subtitle: Turnover data from the BLS
item.description:
The first episode includes text from the Bureau of Labor Statistics report on job vacancies and labor turnover from data collected in February 2023. I read the release, and share my initial thoughts. For the official JOLTS release, go to bls.gov.


This is not an official BLS project, but a voluntary project intended for educational purposes.



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
